        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:

        public static void notifyUser​(java.lang.String message)

      • getResponse

        public static java.lang.String getResponse​(java.lang.String message,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> validResponses)
        Collects a response from the user to a given prompt. The calling class must specify what valid responses are
        Parameters:
        message - The prompting message
        validResponses - A list of acceptable responses that should be handled by the calling class upon return
        Returns:
        The appropriate response provided by the user
